website_summaries.verdict: Easy to pack, easy to inflate, easy to put on. These swim floats are a good choice for preschoolers and young elementary-age kids.
pros: More packable and portable than swim vests
Gentler on the arms than other brands
Flat band along the bottom allows arms to slide in more easily
cons: Inflatable, so they can tear and lose air
Sharp corners can poke child in the face when they move their arms

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: good product and fit my son. reason giving 4 stars is because it ripped a little easy when putting on. not the whole thing but a little at the seems. Product worked as described though and our son has cerebral paulsy. he gets to enjoy the water and loves his freedom to swim. Bought 2 pear jus tin case.
customer_reviews.author: apopnj

customer_reviews.title: Quality & holding to the scheduled delivery date.
customer_reviews.text: The product has held up so far with the rough & tumble in the pool with my grandsons. I received the product very quickly which worked out great due to leaving immediately for a weekend of fun & swimming. I don’t allow the swim trainers to be abused so let’s see how long they last under normal use....
customer_reviews.author: Frank R.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I gave one star because it was a two pack set. Other than that it's disappointing because the floatie popped in the pool while my son was wearing it on the first use, luckily he had on a swim vest too and I was in the pool with him.
customer_reviews.author: Latonya

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my 3 yr old! I prefer puddle jumpers, as a former lifeguard, i believe they're safer, but our town pool doesn't allow puddle jumpers, so I got these floaties. A friend had these & they worked great, so I got some for us. I bought a 2 pack in case they broke easily but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Works great and compact to carry
customer_reviews.text: Took these to Hawaii for a family vacation for a toddler, these were nice and durable (thick plastic) and fitted a toddler's arms just fine. It did not fit on an older child (8-10) though so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, always a great brand. Very thick so not easily scratxhed or leaking air like cheap other arm floaties.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyAngel1107

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick material. Easy to blow up. Works well for my 5 yo. Good price for 2 sets so great to have extra if we have guests or if one breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mama

customer_reviews.title: work well, good price
customer_reviews.text: These work really well and are sturdy for inflatable float devices. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LinVT

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Bought this for my 6 year old daughter who is learning to swim. They fit well and did the job. She was able to be more independent at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old, (terrified of water) LOVES his new floaties!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka

customer_reviews.title: Great quality...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected and great safety gift bought off season from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: JillinWPB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for taking on vacation for the kiddos in the the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Bekjo

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My son moved these wings in our trips. He has tiny arms and it worked, 22 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: JSF

customer_reviews.title: One had a hole in it.
customer_reviews.text: Received promptly on Saturday. Put them on a 3 year old and walked 2 blocks to pool and one was flat. It had a hole in it. Not worth the hassle of returning
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Mills

customer_reviews.title: Floaties!
customer_reviews.text: These look just like the orange plastic arm floaties from the '90's when I was a kid. I'm so happy to see that they are still making them. My kids are so excited to have them now.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaew4

customer_reviews.title: Floaties used for 2 year old.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only type of floaties that my child likes. Only thing I don’t like is that I feel like it loses air at times.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn O.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect with my little girls
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with my little girls. I used it all summer. The only problem is they do get minor holes causing it to loose air, but only after leaving it out overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Brown$-96

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery and affordable. Just what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. We had a trip to a swip park and needed them fast (amazon prime is worth it). Only bad thing is while they're wet it's hard to get them back on. But these floaties have always been that way in my experience. Suited our needs so thank you.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Blow up easily, fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Em

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: One came with a tear in it, unable to use . The other set was great .
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these to a friend of mine for her little girl to swim. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great floats. We used them right away and my 3yo now swims like a fish or at least as well as you can with floaties around your arm. He likes them and thats all that matters to us.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bariola

product_meta.title: Intex - Arm Band Swim Trainers (6.3 x 5 x 1.1 inches), (3.8 Ounces) (2-Pack)
product_meta.description: Intex - Arm Band Swim Trainers (6.3 x 5 x 1.1 inches), (3.8 Ounces) (2-Pack)
